sentences.en: A glass lacquer was developed by Hickon at the Royal Aircraft Establishment in England in 1965.
sentences.cn: 1965年,希克森在英国皇家飞机公司研制出一种玻璃漆.

sentences.en: At each side stood a low table of foreign lacquer in the shape of plum - blossom.
sentences.cn: 两边设一对梅花式洋漆小几.

sentences.en: Can say, the manual is the soul of lacquer engravings were collected.
sentences.cn: 可以说, 手工是漆线雕的灵魂.

sentences.en: He has learned the skill of lacquer painting from his master.
sentences.cn: 他跟师傅学到了磨漆画这项技艺.

sentences.en: I was surrounded by sky - blue silk and polished lacquer.
sentences.cn: 我被天蓝色的绸子和光亮的漆器包围著.

sentences.en: If the thinner is re - applied to an acrylic lacquer it will re - dissolve.
sentences.cn: 如果稀释剂被再次用到丙烯酸漆中时就会溶解.

sentences.en: PVC owning independent intellectual property right dispense with lacquer suit door.
sentences.cn: 拥有自主知识产权的PVC免漆套装门.

sentences.en: The barrel of Fujian lacquer can be used to paint this chair.
sentences.cn: 这桶建漆可以用来漆这把椅子.

sentences.en: The decor is simple—black lacquer panels on white walls.
sentences.cn: 装潢风格非常简单——白色墙上镶着漆成黑色的裙板。

sentences.en: The grip is wooden and painted with Qing lacquer.
sentences.cn: 握把还是木的刷过清漆.

sentences.en: The inside of each can is sprayed with lacquer.
sentences.cn: 每个罐子里面都被喷上了漆.

sentences.en: The red lacquer work on the upper wall was badly chipped.
sentences.cn: 墙面上的红漆已经脱落了不少.

sentences.en: They are made of wood and pointed with water - proof lacquer.
sentences.cn: 他们由木和针对性制成与防水亮漆.

sentences.en: We finished the desk in antique red lacquer.
sentences.cn: 我们用古式红漆仔细油漆了这张桌子.

sentences.en: We put on the second coating of lacquer.
Without using lacquer, they still have excellent feeling and antifouling effect.
sentences.cn: 不上油漆但拥有出色的手感和防污效果.设计新颖实用,造型简洁美观.

trans.tran_en: a liquid painted onto metal or wood to form a hard shiny surface

trans.tran_cn: 涂漆于，使…表面或外观光滑
